TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BufferModeSettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class BufferModeSettings Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 配置事件提供程序的 ASP.NET 事件缓存设置。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET event-buffering settings for event providers.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于定义事件提供程序的角色，如关键、通知、分析和日志记录。The class is used to define roles for event providers, such as Critical, Notification, Analysis, and Logging. 根据相应角色，每个角色会以不同方式缓冲事件。Each role would buffer events differently, as appropriate for that role. 例如，关键角色会将 、 和 属性设置为小，而分析角色会将这些属性设置为更高的值。For example a Critical role would keep the , , and properties small, whereas an Analysis role would set those properties to higher values. 此类对应于 `bufferModes` 配置文件元素。This class corresponds to the `bufferModes` configuration-file element. ## Examples 下面的配置文件节选显示了如何以声明方式为类的几个属性指定值 。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. ``` ```

param.name: name
param.span: 所创建的 对象的名称。

span.span: The name of the object being created.

param.name: maxBufferSize
param.span: 一次可缓存的最大事件数。

span.span: The maximum number of events buffered at one time.
The value must be greater than zero.

param.name: maxFlushSize
param.span: 每次可缓存刷新的最大事件数。

span.span: The maximum number of events per buffer flush.
Must be greater than zero.

param.name: urgentFlushThreshold
param.span: 在触发缓存刷新之前缓存的事件数。

span.span: The number of events buffered before a buffer flush is triggered.

param.span: 该值必须大于零且小于或等于 。

span.span: The value must be greater than zero and less than or equal to .

param.name: regularFlushInterval
param.span: 两次缓存刷新之间的标准时间长度。

span.span: The standard amount of time between buffer flushes.

param.span: 将值设置为 刻度可使其无限大。

span.span: The value can be made infinite by setting it to ticks.

param.name: urgentFlushInterval
param.span: 两次缓存刷新之间允许间隔的最小时间长度。

span.span: The minimum length of time that can pass between buffer flushes.
The value must be less than or equal to .

param.name: maxBufferThreads
param.span: 一次可处于活动状态的最大缓存刷新线程数。

span.span: The maximum number of buffer-flushing threads that can be active at one time.

summary.span: 获取或设置一次可缓存的最大事件数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of events that can be buffered at one time.

value.span: 一次可缓存的最大事件数。

span.span: The maximum number of events that can be buffered at one time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值必须大于零。This property must have a value greater than zero. 如果保存了配置节，则无效值可能会导致引发异常。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 默认值因提供程序而异。The default value varies based on the provider. 集合中的 提供程序按名称引用集合中的对象 。The objects in the collection are referred to by name by the providers in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置一次可处于活动状态的最大刷新线程数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of flushing threads that can be active at one time.

value.span: 一次可处于活动状态的最大刷新线程数。

span.span: The maximum number of flushing threads that can be active at one time.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值必须大于零。This property must have a value greater than zero. 如果保存了配置节，则无效值可能会导致引发异常。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
